projectGridLines.title: Dynamic Charging Electric Road System Application for Public Transport
projectGridLines.description:
Description: To conduct a comprehensive study on the feasibility, benefits, challenges, and

implementation strategies of Electric Road Systems (ERS) for government-run buses in 3 major

Indian cities: Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad

Skill sets: Electronics , Microsoft power point , Power BI , communication skill , outspokenness.

Traits expectation: The study will enhance the student knowledge and perspective of the EV

mobility domain

Expected learning: In depth understanding of EV mobility , charging

Specific courses required for project execution: Power electronics, prototyping , Data analytics


(Skills)

1.Must have skills

 Knowledge and/or skill of

 

- Electrical Engineering

- Embedded Techologies

- Communication Technologies

 

2.Nice to have skills

 

- Marketing skills (it is nice to have since Applicability Study contains an aspect of market analysis)

- Cyber Security Knowledge (ERS is infrastructure of society, thus needs to be protected securely)

- M.Tech is also available to apply

 

 

3.The kind of person we are looking for

- Outspoken

- Easy to communicate (Communication is a significant part of proceeding the project)
